item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 00:26:55 UTC – Details)

From the brand

ABOUT US

At Thermajane, we believe that keeping warm and cozy shouldn’t compromise style. We design our thermal underwear to give you the perfect solution to staying comfortable all season long.

Thermajane Thermal Collection

Thermajohn Thermal Collection

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11 x 8 x 2 inches; 10.23 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ J-T-W-1835
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 1, 2019
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07KFQDHW8

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Heat Retention: Thermajane womens thermal underwear keeps your body heat from escaping. They provide extra warmth and coziness to make a perfect everyday baselayer.
Ultra Soft: Our thermals for women are lined with fleece for extra softness against your skin. They’ll protect you from the cold for added comfort.
Moisture Wicking: While at home or at work, our womens long johns will keep you dry and odor free. No matter the activity, you’ll stay confident all day.

Embrace the great outdoors this winter with Thermajane womens long johns thermal sets. Suitable for all activities, this thermal set has ultra soft fleece and 4 way stretch. They can be worn under clothes as a baselayer for maximum warmth, comfort and mobility.

Heat Retention

Our women thermal underwear set retains your body heat for ultimate warmth.

Ultra Soft

Womens thermals feature a fleece lining for an added sense of luxurious touch on your skin.

Moisture Wicking

Stay dry all day as our thermal sets for women will wick away moisture for extra comfort.

Read more

4-Way Stretch

The highly stretchable fabric of our long johns for women ensures maximum mobility.

Tagless

The tagless design of our women’s long johns thermal set prevents irritation or chafing during wear.

Style

With 13 colors to choose from, our ladies thermal underwear will fit your sense of fashion and style.

Read more
